forecast.name: Thanksgiving Day
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 34. West wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Snow Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered snow showers before midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 26. West northwest wind 13 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 35, with temperatures falling to around 32 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 20. West wind 2 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

nubsNob.comments: We are going to open the Lodge, General Store, Tune Center, Cafeteria and Pub on Black Friday and Small Business Saturday. Doors will be open from 9:00 â€“ 4:00 both days, with the Michigan-Ohio State game on in the pub. Early season tuning specials run through November 29. Get your skis and boards in soon! The General Store also has many great gift ideas for the skier on your list.
